content.description: The following question refers to the topic of economic developments in the 1700s.
content.question: Which of the following best explains European states’ ability to dominate the world trade system in the 1700s?

choices.label: The superior quality of European manufactured goods produced for export
Coordinated efforts by Europe’s rulers to minimize economic competition
The creation of large European land empires in Asia and Africa
Europe’s continued superiority in naval and maritime technology

content.answer: Europe’s continued superiority in naval and maritime technology

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
